segments.text: Hey , Paul , why the long face ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I had a terrible day of work , I'm thinking of quiting my job .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Take it easy , maybe tomorrow will be different .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know , I can't stand my job these days .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Cheer up , I hope you'll feel better soon .
segments.speaker: S1
